decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (  ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - No windows or openings shall be inserted in the flank/side walls of the rear extension hereby permitted without the prior approval of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - 4.	Prior to the first use of the rear extension hereby permitted, the elevations shall be entirely clad in timber as shown on the approved plans, and shall be retained as such thereafter.

Condition : 5 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.
description: Erection of a single storey rear extension
